ns0:model.name: mango
ns0:model.description: Data model based oon components and data association for source data
ns0:model.title: Mango
ns0:model.author: Laurent Michel, Fran??ois Bonnarel, Gilles Landais, Mireille Louys, Marco Molinaro, Jesue Salgado

enumeration.name: ShapeFrame
enumeration.description: Possible schemes to encode a shape in a string

enumeration.name: ShapeSerialization
enumeration.description: Enumeration of the supported serialization modes for the shapes

literal.name: MOC
literal.description: Label indicating that the shape has been serialized as a S-MOC

literal.name: STCS
literal.description: Label indicating that the shape has been serialized as a STCS string

literal.name: POLYGON
literal.description: Label indicating that the shape has been serialized as a polygon (cf xtypes)

enumeration.name: CalibrationLevel
enumeration.description: Enumeration of different possible calibration status of the property (Obscore)

literal.name: Raw
literal.description: Raw instrumental data, in a proprietary or internal data provider defined format, that needs instrument specific tools to be handled (ObsCore)

literal.name: Instrumental
literal.description: Instrumental data in a standard format which could be manipulated with standard astronomical packages (ObsCore).

literal.name: Calibrated
literal.description: Science ready data with the instrument signature removed (ObsCore)

enumeration.name: ColorDefinition
enumeration.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

literal.name: HardnessRatio
literal.description: Normalized ratio of fluxes: $(F_{EB2} - F_{EB1}) / (F_{EB2} + F_{EB1})$

dataType.name: VocabularyTerm
dataType.description: Term of a standardised vocabulary that applies to property.

attribute.name: uri
attribute.description: URI the vocabulary term.

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: Label attached to the vocabulary term. This is necessary because the URI may not contain an explicit label. This was the case for the IUA vocabulary until the Registry WG introduced rewriting rules that fix the issue.

objectType.name: MangoObject
objectType.description: Root class of the model. A MangoObject is something with an identifier and two docks: one for the parameters and one for the associated data.

attribute.name: identifier
attribute.description: Unique identifier for a MangoObject. The uniqueness of that identifier is not managed by the model. The format is free.

composition.name: associatedDataDock
composition.description: Collection f all data associated with the MANGO entity.

composition.name: propertyDock
composition.description: Collection of all parameters attached to the MANGO entity.

reference.name: dataOrigin
reference.description: Description of the origin of the MANGO object. The parameters contained in this component come from the work of the DCP-IG.

objectType.name: AssociatedData
objectType.description: Abstract reference to a particular dataset associated to the MANGO entity. This class is used to specify the type of the dataset as well as its role.

attribute.name: semantic
attribute.description: Semantic concept giving the nature of the associated data. As long as the vocabulary is not set, the possible values of this attribute are given by the LinkSemantic enumeration.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Free text description of the associated data

objectType.name: WebEndpoint
objectType.description: Associated data referenced by an URL

attribute.name: ContentType
attribute.description: URL mime type

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: Web endpoint

objectType.name: AssociatedMangoInstance
objectType.description: Reference to another MANGO instance that is part of the associated data.

composition.name: mangoInstance
composition.description: Composition link pointing on one MANGO instance associated with the source.

objectType.name: Property
objectType.description: Reference to a particular measure of the MANGO entity. This class is used to specify the type of the measure as well as its role.

attribute.name: semantic
attribute.description: Reference to a semantic concept giving the nature of the parameter As long as the vocabulary is not set, the possible values of this attribute are given by the ParamSemantic enumeration.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Free text description of the measure

composition.name: measure
composition.description: Composition link pointing to the meas:Measure instance

objectType.name: Status
objectType.description: Property representing a status defined by a integer number that can only take on a defined number of values, each with its own description. Boolean status can be represented by \texttt{StatusValues} with 2 values e.g. 0 for False and 1 for True.

attribute.name: status
attribute.description: Actual value of the status.

composition.name: allowedValues
composition.description: List of the allowed values for the status. Each value has its own textual description.

objectType.name: Label
objectType.description: Free text label seen as a MANGO object property.

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: Text of label seen as a MANGO object property.

objectType.name: Shape
objectType.description: Description of the spatial extension of the MANGO object (for e.g. dust clouds).

attribute.name: shape
attribute.description: String serialization of the spatial extension of the MANGO object.

attribute.name: serialization
attribute.description: Serialization mode of the spatial extension of the MANGO entity

reference.name: coordSys
reference.description: Coordinate system the applies to the spatial extension of the MANGO object. This component is imported from the \texttt{coords} model (see \texttt{coords:SpaceSys}).

objectType.name: PhotometricProperty
objectType.description: Observed brightness of the MANGO object. The distinction between fluxes of a magnitude is made by the unit. This property should refer to a photometric calibration as defined by the \texttt{PhotDM} model.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Value of the photometric property associated with a photometric calibration as defined by the \texttt{PhotDM} model.

reference.name: photCal
reference.description: Photometric calibration that applies to the photometric property. It must be an instance of \texttt{photdm:PhotCal}.

objectType.name: PhysicalProperty
objectType.description: Place holder for any quantity that can be hold by measure as defined in the \texttt{Astronomical Measurements Model}.

attribute.name: calibrationLevel
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

composition.name: measure
composition.description: Instance of \texttt{Astronomical Measurements Model} that holds the Property value(s).

objectType.name: Color
objectType.description: Photometric property describing a color of the MANGO object. color is not an intrinsic quantity of the MANGO object but a value relative to two filters or energy bands.

composition.name: colorDef
composition.description: Color definition. Can be either a difference of magnitudes or an hardness ratio.

objectType.name: ColorDef
objectType.description: Definition of the colour to which the Color property applies. It contains the way the colour is calculated as well as the definition of the filters used.

attribute.name: definition
attribute.description: Enumeration of the different color types supported by the model.

composition.name: high
composition.description: Reference to the \texttt{photdm:PhotFilter} corresponding the highest energy for that color.

composition.name: low
composition.description: Reference to the \texttt{photdm:PhotFilter} corresponding the lowest energy for that color.

objectType.name: BitField
objectType.description: State of a property for which each value is represented by a bit so that several states can be included in the same numerical value. The values defined in the associated StatusValues must correspond to bit patterns. This constraint is not managed by the model.

objectType.name: SatusValues
objectType.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

composition.name: values
composition.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: StatusValue
objectType.description: List of the allowed values for the status. Each value has its own textual description.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: EpochPosition

attribute.name: longitude
attribute.description: The longitude of the Point, as a Quantity with angular units (see \texttt{coords:LonLatPoint.lon}.

attribute.name: latitude
attribute.description: The latitude of the Point, as a Quantity with angular units (see \texttt{coords:LonLatPoint.lat}.

attribute.name: parallax
attribute.description: The measured parallax value in the coordinate system of the \texttt{EpochPosition} instance.

attribute.name: radialVelocity
attribute.description: The measured Velocity value along of the radius axis (see texttt{meas:Velocity.coord}).

attribute.name: pmLongitude
attribute.description: Velocity along the longitude axis in angular distance per unit time (see \texttt{meas:ProperMotion.coord}). The current version of the model only allows a representation in the Polar coordinate space.

attribute.name: pmLatitude
attribute.description: Velocity along the latitude axis in angular distance per unit time (see \texttt{meas:ProperMotion.coord}). The current version of the model only allows a representation in the Polar coordinate space.

attribute.name: epoch
attribute.description: Class grouping all parameters needed to define an object position at a given epoch. The space coordinate system is common to all attributes to insure the consistance between all of the instance parameters.

attribute.name: pmCosDeltApplied
attribute.description: It is common, though not universal, practice to quote longitudinal proper motion pre-multiplied by cos(latitude) so that the magnitude of the quantity is not affected by its longitudinal position. We do not constrain the value to one form or the other in this model. Instead, this flag enables providers to convey whether or not the factor has been applied (see \texttt{meas:ProperMotion.cosLat_applied})

composition.name: errors
composition.description: Error coefficients of the EpochPosition attributes

composition.name: correlations
composition.description: Correlation coefficients between the EpochPosition attributes

reference.name: coordSys
reference.description: Class grouping all parameters needed to define an object position at a given epoch. The space coordinate system is common to all attributes to insure the consistance between all of the instance parameters.

objectType.name: EpochPositionErrors
objectType.description: Class holder for the errors of the EpochPosition attributes

composition.name: parallax
composition.description: Parallax error. This error is meant to be symmetrical

composition.name: radialVelocity
composition.description: Error in the radial velocity. This error is meant to be symmetrical

composition.name: position
composition.description: Position error.

composition.name: properMotion
composition.description: Proper motion error.

objectType.name: EpochPositionCorrelations
objectType.description: Class holder for the correlation coefficients between the EpochPosition attributes

composition.name: positionPm
composition.description: Matrix of the correlation between the position and the proper motion

composition.name: parallaxPm
composition.description: Matrix of the correlation between the parallax and the proper motion

composition.name: positionParallax
composition.description: Matrix of the correlation between the position and the parallax

composition.name: positionPosition
composition.description: Matrix of the self correlation of the position

composition.name: properMotionPm
composition.description: Matrix of the self correlation of the proper motion

package.name: error
package.description: Elliptical error for 2D parameters such as the sky positions.

dataType.name: PropertyError
dataType.description: Root (abstract) class of the errors that can be attached to a MANGO property. The class inherits from \texttt{meas:uncertainty} in order to be usable in the context of properties based on \texttt{Measures} classes.

attribute.name: confidenceLevel
attribute.description: Confidence level of the error, expressed in $\sigma$

attribute.name: unit
attribute.description: Error unit. It must be compliant with the \texttt{VOUnit} standard. The error unit must be consistent with the unit of the property the error is attached with. This is not checked at the model level.

attribute.name: sigma
attribute.description: Error amplitude.

dataType.name: ErrorMatrix
dataType.description: Error matrix for 2D quantities. The matrix must be symetric.

attribute.name: sigma1
attribute.description: First diagonal element ($(x_{11})$)

attribute.name: sigma2
attribute.description: Second diagonal element ($(x_{11})$)

attribute.name: covariance
attribute.description: Covariance element ($(x_{12})$ or $(x_{21})$)

attribute.name: isCovariance
attribute.description: Boolean flag telling whether the error elements must be interpreted as covariance or matrix elements.

dataType.name: Ellipse
dataType.description: Elliptical error for 2D parameters such as the sky positions.

attribute.name: semiMajorAxis
attribute.description: Half of the ellipse major axis

attribute.name: semiMinorAxis
attribute.description: Half of the ellipse minor axis

attribute.name: angle
attribute.description: Angle between the North Polar Cape (NCP) and the major axis. This angle must be positive taking into account that angles are positive from North to the East. The angle has its own unit.

dataType.name: PropertyError2D
dataType.description: Super (abstract) class for all errors of 2D parameters

package.name: correlation
package.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

dataType.name: Correlation12
dataType.description: Correlation of a 1D property (A) with a 2D parameter (B): $A = a1b1 * B_1 + a12 * B_2$

attribute.name: a1b1
attribute.description: Correlation coefficient giving the contribution of the first axis of \texttt{B} to \texttt{A}

attribute.name: a1b2
attribute.description: Correlation coefficient giving the contribution of the second axis of \texttt{B} to \texttt{A}

dataType.name: QuantityCorrelation
dataType.description: Abstract type for the correlation parameters of 2 quantities

attribute.name: isCovariance
attribute.description: Boolean telling whether the correlations must be interpreted as covariance or as correlation coefficients.

dataType.name: Correlation11
dataType.description: Correlation of a 1D property (A) with a 1D parameter (B): $A = a1b1 * B$

attribute.name: a1b1
attribute.description: Correlation coefficient giving the contribution of \texttt{B} to \texttt{A}

dataType.name: Correlation22
dataType.description: Correlation of a 2D property (A) with a 2D parameter (B): $A_1 = a11 * B_1 + a12 * B_2 $ $A_2 = a21 * B_1 + a22 * B_2 $

attribute.name: a2b1
attribute.description: Correlation coefficient giving the contribution of the second axis of \texttt{B} to the first axis of \texttt{A}.

attribute.name: a2b2
attribute.description: Correlation coefficient giving the contribution of the second axis of \texttt{B} to the second axis of \texttt{A}.

attribute.name: a1b1
attribute.description: Correlation coefficient giving the contribution of the first axis of \texttt{B} to the first axis of \texttt{A}.

attribute.name: a1b2
attribute.description: Correlation coefficient giving the contribution of the second axis of \texttt{B} to the first axis of \texttt{A}.

dataType.name: Correlation21
dataType.description: Correlation of a 2D property (A) with a 1D parameter (B): $A_1 = a11 * B$ $A_2 = a21 * B$

attribute.name: a2b1
attribute.description: Correlation coefficient giving the contribution of \texttt{B} to the second axis of \texttt{A}

attribute.name: a1b1
attribute.description: Correlation coefficient giving the contribution of \texttt{B} to the first axis of \texttt{A}

package.name: dataorigin
package.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: DataOrigin
objectType.description: Class representing the origin of the data following the DCP note (TBD)

attribute.name: citation
attribute.description: Dataset identifier that can be used for citation (e.g. DOI)

attribute.name: reference_url
attribute.description: Dataset landing page

attribute.name: resource_version
attribute.description: Dataset version

attribute.name: creator
attribute.description: Person(s) mainly involved in the creation of the resource, generally the author

attribute.name: cites
attribute.description: Identifier (IVOID, DOI or Bibcode) of a second Resource using relation of type \texttt{cites} (\url{https://www.ivoa.net/rdf/voresource/relationship_type/})

attribute.name: is_derived_from
attribute.description: Identifier (IVOID, DOI or Bibcode) of a second resource using relation of type \texttt{is_derived_from} (\url{https://www.ivoa.net/rdf/voresource/relationship_type/})

attribute.name: original_date
attribute.description: Date of the original resource from which the MANGO object is derived

reference.name: query
reference.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

reference.name: rights
reference.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

reference.name: article
reference.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: Article
objectType.description: Reference article for the MANGO entity

attribute.name: editor
attribute.description: Article editor name

attribute.name: article
attribute.description: Bibcode or DOI of the reference article

objectType.name: QueryOrigin
objectType.description: Description of the query the MANGO instance results from.

attribute.name: ivoid
attribute.description: IVOID of the underlying data collection

attribute.name: publisher
attribute.description: Data center that produced the MANGO instance

attribute.name: server_software
attribute.description: Version of the software the produced the MANGO object instance. It is encouraged to follow \url{https://ivoa.net/documents/Notes/softid/index.html}.

attribute.name: service_protocol
attribute.description: IVOID of the protocol through which the data was retrieved

attribute.name: request
attribute.description: Full request URL including a query string. For the simple protocols,put the url-encoded form of the query parameters. For TAP queries, use the /sync UWS URL. The format is free for others request types.

attribute.name: query
attribute.description: Input query in a formal langage such as ADQL.equest types

attribute.name: request_date
attribute.description: Query execution date

attribute.name: contact
attribute.description: Email or URL to contact the publisher

objectType.name: License
objectType.description: Place holder for the license covering the MANGO instance

attribute.name: rights_uri
attribute.description: Licence URI following the regostry practice. This should come from SPDX \url{https://spdx.org/licenses}. Creatives Commons (\url{https://creativecommons.org}) are also accepted.

attribute.name: rights
attribute.description: License or Copyright text
